entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:07 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -31.9°C

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
